playtimer.help:
/playtimer help -- shows this help message
/playtimer sync -- synchronize the timer with the server
/playtimer reset -- resets the timer to 00:00:00
/playtimer toggle -- hide or show the timer
text.autoconfig.playtimer.option.playtim: Set position of playtimer to ne of the 4 corners
text.autoconfig.playtimer.title: Playtimer Mod
